title: Brotherhood Beats Isolation
verse_text: Though one may be overpowered, two can defend themselves. A cord of three strands is not quickly broken.
insight: Lone wolves starve; packs survive. Ecclesiastes 4:12 reminds us that strength is multiplied in community, not isolation.
Isolation is easy but dangerous. Brotherhood builds resilience, accountability, and courage.
one_minute_win: Send one brother a text: “I’ve got your back.”
declaration: I don’t fight alone. I fight with brothers.
